content.question: Do you have your marriage certificate with you now?
content.originalCertificate: You'll be asked to upload a digital photo of the certificate. You can use your phone to do this if it has a camera.
content.camera: If you don't have your certificate you should save and close your application and return later.
content.certificateTranslation: You must have the original certificate or a certified copy. If it isn't in English, you'll also need to provide a certified translation.

screenHasMarriageCert.required: Select yes if you have your marriage certificate
screenHasMarriageCert.invalid: Select yes if you have your marriage certificate

content.question: A yw eich tystysgrif priodas gennych yn awr?
content.originalCertificate: Gofynnir ichi lwytho llun digidol o’r dystysgrif. Gallwch ddefnyddio’ch ffôn i wneud hyn os oes ganddo gamera.
content.camera: Os nad yw eich tystysgrif gennych, dylech arbed a chau eich cais a dychwelyd ato yn hwyrach ymlaen.
content.certificateTranslation: Mae’n rhaid ichi feddu ar y dystysgrif wreiddiol neu copi ardystiedig. Os nad yw yn Saesneg, bydd angen ichi ddarparu cyfieithiad ardystiedig.

screenHasMarriageCert.required: Dewiswch oes os yw eich tystysgrif priodas gennych
screenHasMarriageCert.invalid: Dewiswch oes os yw eich tystysgrif priodas gennych
